text: Alaha kise upara zimevari da bhara nahim pa'unda. Paratu usadi sahinasakati de anusara (hi pa'unda hai). Usa nu uha hi milega jihara usa ne kama'i'a ate usa upara pavega jo usa ne kita. He sade palanahara! Jekara asim bhuli'e jam asim galati kara ja'i'e tam sanu na pharhim. He sade palanahara! Sade upara bhara na pa jiho jiha tusim pahilam ho caî€¼uki'am upara bhara pa'i'a. He sade palanahara! Sade tom uha na cukava jisa nu cukana di samaratha sade vica nahim. Sanu mu'afa kara de ate sade upara rahima kara. Tu sada kama bana'una vala haim. Phira avagi'akari'am de mukabale sadi saha'ita kara
